attributes.action: to stop mothers being able to claim from csa when they have stopped absent parants contact
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think its wrong that women have been given the right to make a living from having babys under current law a women can have a child never let the father see the said child but still claim money from him this needs to be looked at. if a woman or man wants no involvement from other party then they surly give up the right to any money
